signature: List<? extends T> replace(List<? extends T>, T, List<T>)

enhanced_by.reason: Both methods involve modifying a list by adding elements.

enhanced_by.method_name: remove(List<? extends T>, List<? extends T>)
enhanced_by.reason: Both methods involve modifying a list by removing elements.
The 'replace' method might be used in scenarios where bounding rectangles are calculated, though the direct dependency is not strong.
